website_summaries.verdict: Attractive brushed bronze finish. The well-engineered mounting base is designed to keep the soap dish in place.
pros: Grid grate design prevents slivers of soap from falling through slits
Made of corrosion-resistant stainless steel and plastic
cons: Adhesion deteriorated in some models rather quickly

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY - Doesn’t hold
customer_reviews.text: I follow the directions exactly as written. I cleaned the surface of my flat travertine with rubbing alcohol. I waited 30 minutes for it to dry. I applied the product and installed it exactly as described. I tightened the knob and then re-tightened it every 30 minutes for the first two hours. In less than five hours it fell off and wouldn’t hold.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Falls off in time
customer_reviews.text: This goes on easily and seems to hold tight...until the middle of the night and then it comes tumbling down. It doesn’t stay long term. I couldn’t be more disappointed in videos the don’t show it up long term or in reviews that give it raving remarks. It is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Pohonui

customer_reviews.title: Great Soap Dish if you follow instructions
customer_reviews.text: Easy installation. MUST be attached on porcelain/totally smooth tile (not stone, textured or multi-tonal glazed tile). Do not install over grout lines or seams. If you observe my prior suggestions, the soap dish should work perfectly. I'm happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Georgia Gardener

customer_reviews.title: Suction holds as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I will no longer buy any other brand suction cup items. I have several pieces of Hasko suction items, and all of them work as advertised. None of the other have; they fall off the tile. Easy installation and they hold perfectly. An extra suction cup came with this item in case the original suction cup didn't hold (but the original holds fine!)
customer_reviews.author: RJamison

customer_reviews.title: Drain the soap
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of soap soup in my shower after my kid bathed. This installed easily and has stayed put on our tile wall. No special effort required and it looks nice. Now there is just soap residue on the floor under it but I’m calling this a win.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Brady

customer_reviews.title: Strong suction
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly strong suction even with a brand new bar of soap. Super happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but will not stay on the tile
customer_reviews.text: Expensive and nice looking but worthless for its use. I have tried over and over to get this to stay on the tile. Within 30 minutes to 2 hours it crashes down, with only a 3 oz bar of soap in it. We cleaned the tile, used rubbing alcohol was suggested, everything. We have another set that was less expensive and chrome that holds amazing, but wanted to get a bronze one that matched the bathroom. Needless to say the chrome set is staying and the bronze one is going in the trash since it will not stick. Worst suction cup ever.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rheaume

customer_reviews.title: Solid, easy to hang, beautiful finish
customer_reviews.text: More solid than I thought it would be...strong suction, super easy to hang. It matches my Command hooks in same dark bronze finish that I use to hang my sponge and pumice stone in the shower.
customer_reviews.author: DarthNurse

customer_reviews.title: Holding up great
customer_reviews.text: Installed the product as directed and during the waiting period it fell off the wall. I got nervous thinking I had made a poor purchase. I didn't want to give up on it, so I re-did the directions and waited until the next day to start using it. Well it has now been a month and I am happy to report that it has been holding up great. Not only is it currently holding a bar of soap but I also have my wash cloth hanging from it and a razor and it is still holding up. Glad I gave this a second chance. And I didn't have to use the adhesive, it is holding up on suction alone!
customer_reviews.author: Mari

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced but great
customer_reviews.text: I think the piece looks really nice and complements my bathroom. I got this as I started using bar soap again and I wanted to make sure that it didn’t get all gooey from sitting in puddles of water. It works really well and everything I’m only deducting stores because it’s a bit too expensive for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  Easy to stick on tile, easy to remove for cleaning or moving.
customer_reviews.text: I bought some nice bar soap instead of liquid so I needed something that would allow the soap to drain and dry well. This was perfect for the job! It's open on the bottom so it can drain and dry more easily. I'm glad it doesn't have an adhesive like other products I saw online. I prefer this suction.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Great way to free up counter space
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy and super easy to install. Doesn’t take up much room and more importantly frees up counter space. Sticks to granite fantastically. One word of advice—make sure you plan out where you want to place it, because you only get shot. You won’t be able move that adhesive and stick it elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Ranu

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install & holds up well
customer_reviews.text: These are a perfect addition to my bathroom and was just what I was looking for. The kit was easy to install and it even came with extra installation accessories depending on your wall type. I've had these installed for about a month and haven't had any issues with it falling.
customer_reviews.author: Relle

customer_reviews.title: Nah. Suction cup would not hold on a clean, alcohol wiped tile wall.
customer_reviews.text: Pass. Would not stick to the tiled bath wall, and I am not willing to mount it using 3M tape that'll never come off ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Lower

customer_reviews.title: Holding up well in my shower
customer_reviews.text: It's been in my shower now for about a month and it is holding on well. I was worried that the adhesive disk may not stay stuck to the shallowly textured plastic shower wall in my RV but it's working well with a large bottle of liquid body soap in it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Slater

customer_reviews.title: Underachiever
customer_reviews.text: I got a follow up email from vendor with specific instructions on how to install this item. I followed instructions exactly and the product suction does not work on porcelain. I do not want to use the adhesive pads that come with this as I want to be able to move it when I feel like it. Disappointed in product performance.
customer_reviews.author: AtomicRancher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Those That Prefer Bars of Soap
customer_reviews.text: Appreciate that water falls through; doesn't become trapped and degrade the soap bar, nor leave soap sludge on the tile wall. Achieved great adhesion without the need to drill holes in the tile. Easy to release and relocate if needed.
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product but for one thing.....
customer_reviews.text: Wet soap sticks to it bigtime and the cagey sides of it can make it difficult to pick up a full bar of soap, esp if it's a flat, square or rectangle bar. You just have to remember to not struggle with trying to grab it laying there and instead pop it up with your finger from the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn M. Patty

customer_reviews.title: Idiot-proof
customer_reviews.text: Holds a large bar of soap or other shower or bath item securely to the wall without having to puncture the wall or use any type of adhesive. Easy to remove and reposition if desired. Highly recommended, keeps the soap dry and out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Fl_Beachcomber

customer_reviews.title: Good design
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of this soap holder. It can easily fit into any style due to its classic look. And I like the fact that it drains completely and does not end up with soap scum or mold build-up.
customer_reviews.author: Paulgu

customer_reviews.title: Does not stick!
customer_reviews.text: I normally do not write reviews but want to save others....I purchased this (as well as similar washcloth hangers) to put in my shower that has marble tiles. It does not stick, I have tried multiple times and it will stick for a little while then just falls. I followed all instructions and this does not work - very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. It works just fine on my slightly textured tile bath.
customer_reviews.author: D.DeVries

customer_reviews.title: Garbage Product, Does Not Adhere
customer_reviews.text: Basket kept popping off of tile, even after installing adhesive disk, it popped off that, too.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: If you follow the directions to a T they are fantastic and I don’t think they will ever come off the shower wall, even if I wanted them to lol. They fit in well with the brushed bronze of all the hardware in the house. They’re sleek and durable. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Sueseiv

customer_reviews.title: Stays where you put it
customer_reviews.text: I love these HASKO products. They are substantial, well made, and they stay where you put them. The suction technology is great. I also love that they have so many coordinating accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia K Combs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect touch for holding special scrubbers!
customer_reviews.text: We love this! Every piece was individually wrapped and safely packed in this sturdy and informative cardboard box. I used the disc with the 3M sticker to adhere to a tile/concrete backsplash. It was very easy to install and the finish on the cage is a nice metallic bronze.
customer_reviews.author: LRod

customer_reviews.title: These work great!
customer_reviews.text: Installed these following the very easy directions and they stayed exactly where we wanted them to. Although we put them on the shower wall which is tile, we used both the suction and adhesion just to be sure. This is the first time we have a soap dish that is actually staying put. I use any old soap, but hubby uses Duke Cannon which is very big and heavy. Weeks later and they haven't fallen - so happy that we took a chance and purchased these!!! Thank you for putting out a product that actually works!!!
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Love this product!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my Hasko shower caddies. I have two (one silver and one bronze) and they are perfect to keep soap from sitting in standing water and turning into slime, not to mention great for storing shampoo, body wash, razor, bath pouf, etc. VERY easy to mount, and I've had no problem with them holding firmly to my shower stall surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy M. Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Nice product. No complaints
customer_reviews.text: Needed to use the extra things given in pkg to keep it in place. Once that was done it has not moved over this past 6 months easily holding everything that has been placed inside.
customer_reviews.author: Rozalynne Banta

customer_reviews.title: It fell off
customer_reviews.text: Like many other posters commented, mine fell after less than 24 hours of being installed. I have very smooth tile and followed the instructions as stated. I want to really love this product, it looks great and doesn't require a drill but I won't deal with it constantly falling off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superb sticking Action!
customer_reviews.text: This product to me is the best all around! It sticks and stays! You have to know the platform you planning item on though. Make sure you know.
customer_reviews.author: Dejax

customer_reviews.title: IMPORTANT SUGGESTION
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product with one important suggestion. If you have a tub insert, try and attach the basket without the circle mounting disk. It is very important to make sure where you mount the disk is where you want it because once it is attached, it is very hard to get off.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Booth

customer_reviews.title: Sticks to smooth tile like a pro!
customer_reviews.text: Sticks to smooth tile like a pro! I’ve had some horrible luck with suction cup items in the past, but this is AMAZING! I also really love the look of it.
customer_reviews.author: VolleyballNut619

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to place in our kitchen sink. We don't like laying our scrub brush on the counter. This was the water isn't laying on our counter.
customer_reviews.author: mmyoung

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and put then in our glass shower wall. They were easy to suction on and have stayed up ever since. I also have 2 of the suction double hooks and those are just as good. I'd definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Palmjay

customer_reviews.title: It won’t stay in place.
customer_reviews.text: This item would not stay attached to multiple areas of polished travertine in my shower. It would last perhaps 1-2 days before it would fall. I cleaned the attachment areas carefully and tried each location fully dry and also with some water on the surface. On The glass door it would hold for 2-4 days before it would fall. I even tried the plastic disk that came with the unit and it would only hold for a day or two.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie Morris

customer_reviews.title: Kitchen sponge holder!
customer_reviews.text: I attached this right to the inside of my farm sink to hold my sponges while they drip dry - no more stinky sponges! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Karen O

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: I had read the reviews and some people had problems with the product staying attached. Well, so far this is doing a great job and it is just what we needed.
customer_reviews.author: Oregon customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: My bathtub doesn’t have a soap holder so I purchased this one. At first it was sort of confusing. I have it hung now and it hasn’t fallen off ... yet. Although, I haven’t taken a bath yet to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Holds Great!
customer_reviews.text: I really like Hasko suction cup products. They're easy to install and hold tight. Yet, you can move them if you need to.
customer_reviews.author: Hideko L. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Great suction that never falls off
customer_reviews.text: I bought one two years ago and its still working like the day i got it. Bought this 2nd one because i keep an extra bar of soap in the shower now
customer_reviews.author: Zota1359

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for something exactly like this for my bathroom and it works out perfectly. It’s very easy to assemble, and, it goes well with my tiles.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Durable and secure/won’t loose suction
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried that this would not hold. I was pleasantly supirised when my husband installed it. This is durable and feels secure - and it won’t lose suction. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Aragon

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: These hold really well on the subway tile (non-textured) I have. I ended up ordering another for scrunchies.
customer_reviews.author: C. Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Grips on the wall well
customer_reviews.text: Really easy to put together and the suction is strong and works well. Great product would buy another if I need it
customer_reviews.author: I C Wightman

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed. Incredibly easy to put together and looks great! Has been on the shower wall for two weeks, has not fallen down once. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: it girl

customer_reviews.title: Soap holder
customer_reviews.text: We just installed a new shower & didn’t want to have permanent soap dishes placed in the marble. This soap dispenser works great & has stayed on for several months now. No rust too!
customer_reviews.author: Traci L. Clark

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, and quality.
customer_reviews.text: Really like it, and changed my daily shower routine with such a simple improvement..well worth it, and cool color as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great suction hold
customer_reviews.text: Soap dish is attractive and it sticks! Applied it to tile shower wall- wiped tile first with alcohol and applied dish as directed, turning knob to tighten. It was immediately secure on the wall and holds a very large/ heavy bar of soap with no problem. Very pleased with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. WARREN

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: This product is worthless. I have granite shower walls which is clearly a sealed, smooth, flat surface and no matter what we did we couldn't even get a loofa, bar of soap, etc. to hang without the entire thing falling off the wall. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Great for kitchen also
customer_reviews.text: I actually have this in my kitchen sink for my sponge. I really like it
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t Suck but also “sucks”
customer_reviews.text: This adhered to my shower for 6 mos. it fell of after 6 mos and now won’t stick. Reached out yo the seller and didn’t hear back.
customer_reviews.author: MBF

customer_reviews.title: Great products!
customer_reviews.text: I truly love all of the HASKO bath accessories. I haven’t been disappointed in a single one. We have the soap dishes, hooks, and 2 types of shower caddies. The stay put and save space in the shower/tub area. The first HASKO soap dish we bought was at least 4 years ago and it hasn’t rusted, never fell and still looks great after all this time.
customer_reviews.author: Ashaw

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have bought this a long time ago
customer_reviews.text: So far really like this soap holder in the shower. The way it attaches is pretty unique and it is a solid contact.
customer_reviews.author: Kristinave

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: These soap dishes work great! I have had these up for a while and they never come off the wall!
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great products
customer_reviews.text: Have several of these products; great addition to our shower.
customer_reviews.author: Percheron lover

customer_reviews.title: Is there a piece missing!?
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cute soap dish that im not able to use. Either I just dont get it or there is a piece missing. The circle part does stick very well but ill have to take it down to return.
customer_reviews.author: Tameika

customer_reviews.title: Easy and functional
customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install. It holds my soap and razor and allows drainage through the bottom. No problems with suction at all.
customer_reviews.author: Katie S.

customer_reviews.title: Great soap dish
customer_reviews.text: I read some reviews where people had problems with the dish staying adhered to the wall. I have stone tile in my shower and have not had any problems with the dish falling. It looks great and stayed in place.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan

customer_reviews.title: Save your money, suction does not hold
customer_reviews.text: If you want to risk damage to your wall using the adhesion, I did not want to and fell for the suction process described. Falls off the wall, within minutes of placing the soap. I even cut Ivory, IVORY the lightest soap there is in half and it still fell off.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Looks great,  works great.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Had to use plastic circle on slate tile.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Dish
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. Looks great. Materials are of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: VartLiv

customer_reviews.title: Super strong hold
customer_reviews.text: Money well spent don’t think twice about this product it’s amazing

customer_reviews.title: Kind of confusing
customer_reviews.text: Once I figured out the instructions it was pretty easy to install. Photos would help.

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly and looks great
customer_reviews.text: This product works great. Just follow the directions to mount it and it will stay in place.
customer_reviews.author: Wishwasbiking

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Installed it about a month ago in a fiberglass shower and it has been holding my little soap bar ever since. No complaints, very happy with the item!

customer_reviews.title: No problem sticking to the shower
customer_reviews.text: Followed the instructions and didn't have any problems getting the dish to stick.

customer_reviews.title: Stays out!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe how good this works on my stall shower door. Great adhesion and looks good too!

customer_reviews.title: Bot a good product
customer_reviews.text: Kept falling off. 5 minutes after we installed it. Sent it back.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, really impressed with how well this sticks to the tile wall in my shower. Really nice look to it as well, matches the shower faucet perfectly. Exactly what I was looking for.

customer_reviews.title: Easy strong suction.
customer_reviews.text: Very cool design. Very strong suction. Just ordered matching hooks.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and works as described. Would buy again!!

customer_reviews.text: Love it!! Looks great on the wall with new tile and soap scum washes off easy

product_meta.title: HASKO accessories - Super Powerful Vacuum Suction Cup Soap Dish - Strong Stainless Steel Sponge Holder for Bathroom & Kitchen (Bronze)
product_meta.description:
We offer one of the best vacuum suction systems for mounting – Super Suctionfix. You are not going to worry that the fixing is not strong enough now. The time-proven system is one of the best among the competitors and holds the load of about 22 lbs. 

The suction cup is made of natural rubber, and the soap dish is stainless steel, which guarantees secure fixation and long operation time. Bronze coating ensures the excellent look, and the quality of the materials is verified by numerous tests. 

Suction works best on ceramic tile, glass, mirror, granite, stainless steel, acrylic, plastic, laminate and any non-porous smooth surfaces.

We are confident in our product, so we guarantee 100% refund of money you spent if the fixing is not strong enough for you or you do not like the quality of the materials.

So Don't Delay... Scroll back up the top of this page and purchase with confidence.

 Material Type:

 Soap basket - stainless steel. 

 Cap and knob – plastic. 

Suction cap - rubber. 

Note:

Suction will not work over grout lines or on porous surfaces, such as: wood, porcelain, marble, wallpaper, natural stones such as Travertines, painted wall & any surface that is bumpy, etc...
feature_bullets: NO TOOLS, NO DRILLING, NO SCREWS, NO HOLES: With the suction cup technology, it becomes extremely easy to install suction cup soap dish: simply position on a smooth surface, apply pressure and turn clockwise.

3M ADHESIVE MOUNTING DISCS INCLUDED: To install your HASKO suction soap basket on a concave and convex rough surface, you'll need to use the 3M Adhesive Mounting Disc first which we have provided in the package!

CORROSION RESISTANT: Rust Proof and corrosion resistant construction prevent rusting. The soap dish is made of stainless steel, Cap and knob made up of hardened plastic, and the suction cup itself made up of premium quality rubber.
EASY TO USE: It is very convenient to rent an apartment, people move frequently. Simply loosen the suction cup and take the soap dish. Within a few minutes, place in a new location.

100% RISK-FREE SATISFACTION GUARANTEE – We also offer you 100% risk-free satisfaction guarantee. If you have any questions or concerns with your soap holder, you can conveniently contact us. We have an awesome Customer Service Team and will do whatever it takes to make it right for you!
